entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:38 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
